getForClass

public java.lang.String getForClass()

addToMenuContainer

public abstract void addToMenuContainer(MenuSubItemIF msi)
Description copied from class: MenuInstance
Derived classes must overload this method to add sub menu instances to their chosen type of top level component. We can't handle the addition at this level because there is no standard menu container i.e. the tool bar container is different from the menu bar.

Specified by:
addToMenuContainer in class MenuInstance
Parameters:
msi - The item to be added.

getMenu

public abstract com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.Component getMenu()
Description copied from class: MenuInstance
Derived classes should return the component that represents whatever type of menu they implement.

Specified by:
getMenu in class MenuInstance
Returns:
The menu component.
